articles.author: Story By Reuters
articles.title: Western Europeans wilt in early summer heatwave, compounding climate change fears - CNN
articles.description: Spain is seeing its hottest early summer temperatures, one area of France banned outdoor events, and drought stalked Italian farmers as a heatwave sent Europeans hunting for shade and fretting over climate change.

articles.title: Ukraine moves closer to EU membership as Putin again slams 'insane' Western sanctions - CBC News
